name: A Softer Ravelry
description: This is a re-imagining of the new Ravelry website that keeps all of the new branding, colors, and icons. It changes some of the harsh shadows and lines for a softer look that is hopefully more eye-friendly.
additional_info:
Version 1.2
Fixed more black photo borders
Made search filters match the tags
Version 1.1
Recolored the bottom border
Made the orange buttons less bright
Replaced the hard black borders on photos and ads with grey
